name: Adventure Craft
description: Adventure Craft is a challenging procedurally generated sandbox RPG with roguelike elements. Hunt monsters, horde loot, and craft weapons and armor, to survive in a vast ever-changing RPG world full of action, extreme danger and wonderful surprises.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft速 Windows速 Vista or higher Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.5GHz or equivalent processor. Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Dedicated GPU with 256 MB memory, shader version 4 capable DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 700 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Microsoft速 Windows速 7 or higher Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.8GHz or equivalent processor. Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 8800/AMD Radeon HD 5670 or equivalent video card with 512 MB memory DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 700 MB available space
